gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This collection (stacked series) of datasets is provided to the UVA Library’s Scholars’ Lab by the Chesapeake Bay Program, and is provided AS-IS with no guarantees as regards to its accuracy or temporal currency. It pertains primarily to the infrastructure, transportation, and monitoring stations within the Chesapeake Bay watershed as well as related natural features. * // * The temporal extent of the datasets in the datastack is generally in the 1985-2003 range, but some datasets may include attribute data collected during previous field surveys. * // * Datasets/Layers included in this datastack: * BATHY1METER * wqstations_Type * wb_Type * split_segs_st_polygon_Type * ma_streams_Type * chesbay_Type * cbseg2003_st_polygon_Type * cbseg2003_Type * cbseg1997_Type * cbseg1985_Type * WSHED11_WV_point_Type * WSHED11_PA_point_Type * WBODY_WV_poly_Type * WBODY_WV_point_Type * WBODY_PA_point_Type * WBODY_NY_poly_Type * WBODY_NY_point_Type * STREAMS_WV_arc_Type * STREAMS_PA_arc_Type * STREAMS_NY_arc_Type * ROADS_WV_arc_Type * ROADS_VA_arc_Type * ROADS_PA_arc_Type * ROADS_NY_arc_Type * RAIL_WV_arc_Type * RAIL_PA_arc_Type * RAIL_NY_arc_Type * RAIL_G_arc_Type * RAIL_DE_arc_Type * MD_WBODY_poly_Type * MD_WBODY_point_Type * MD_STREAMS_arc_Type * MD_ROADS_arc_Type * MD_RAILROADS_arc_Type * MD_HUC11_poly_Type * MD_HUC11_point_Type * DE_WBODY_poly_Type * DE_STREAMS_arc_Type * DE_ROADS_arc_Type * DC_WBODY_poly_Type * DC_ROADS_arc_Type * DC_RAIL_arc_Type * BATHY1METER_arc_Type * * // * These data were made available to the University of Virginia for educational and research uses only. Access is restricted to students, faculty and staff of the University of Virginia.
